alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 3:51PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN WYOMING...NORTHERN CATTARAUGUS...SOUTHERN ERIE AND NORTHEASTERN CHAUTAUQUA COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM EST... At 351 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Evangola State Park to 12 miles southwest of Gowanda. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... East Aurora, Boston, Eden, Springville, Colden, Gowanda, Silver Creek, Ashford, Angola, Arcade, Franklinville, North Collins, Chaffee, Wales Center, North Boston, Ashford Hollow, East Concord, Evangola State Park, Angola on the Lake, and Concord. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 57A and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
